participants.name: Aaron Hail, CFP®, RICP®
participants.title: I help career professionals accelerate their financial independence.

messages.message:
Thanks for joining my network Brian. Welcome aboard!

If there is any way I can help you reach your goals, let me know. I’m here to help.

Aaron
2 questions. How do I learn to be a good CEO? And, why invest in a future that I find disappointing?

I can't help you with the CEO piece, but I'm 100% confident I can help you get to a better future. 

My clients tend to have the "work hard, play hard" mindset. You have the work side covered at Swiftpage. If you would like, we can schedule a 10 minute call to see if and how I can help you with the play side of things. Are you interested?
I don't have time for play. I would like to try the new indoor skydiving place though.
Sounds good, best of luck with everything.
